title: Can't insert some models (Atlas) from the Gazebo GUI

content.raw:
My model path points to a directory that conains models. However, Gazebo (version 3.0.0) does not allow me to insert them. 

```
#!bash
GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/tmp/ws/install/share/drcsim_model_resources/gazebo_models/environments:/tmp/ws/install/share:
```

Where /tmp/ws/install/share contains:

```
#!bash

drwxrwxr-x 10 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 atlas_description/
drwxrwxr-x  6 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 atlas_msgs/
drwxrwxr-x  3 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 common-lisp/
drwxrwxr-x  2 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 drcsim/
drwxrwxr-x  8 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 drcsim_gazebo/
drwxrwxr-x  3 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 drcsim_gazebo_plugins/
drwxrwxr-x  3 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/
drwxrwxr-x  8 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:55 drcsim_model_resources/
drwxrwxr-x  5 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 gazebo_msgs/
drwxrwxr-x  5 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 gazebo_plugins/
drwxrwxr-x  4 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 gazebo_ros/
drwxrwxr-x  2 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 gazebo_ros_pkgs/
drwxrwxr-x  8 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 irobot_hand_description/
drwxrwxr-x  8 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 multisense_sl_description/
drwxrwxr-x  4 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 osrf_msgs/
drwxrwxr-x  8 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 sandia_hand_description/
drwxrwxr-x  3 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 sandia_hand_driver/
drwxrwxr-x  5 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 sandia_hand_msgs/
drwxrwxr-x  3 hugo hugo 4096 Nov 27 10:36 sandia_hand_teleop/

```
